item.title: Information Loss via Ricci Flow
item.description: When I was in New York City for the Quarks2Cosmos APS April Meeting this year, I was chatting with some friends about black hole evaporation, where black holes evaporate away due to quantum effects near their apparent horizon thereby violating unitarity in quantum mechanics.
